data.text:
Brooks’ vast campus includes 10 beautiful grass playing fields, as well as a state-of-the-art synthetic turf field dedicated in 2015. The well-maintained fields stand in close proximity, offering teams — field hockey, football and soccer in the fall; baseball, lacrosse and softball in the spring — the chance to easily watch and support each other.

Our 50,474 square-foot athletic center boasts three regulation-length basketball courts, a wrestling center, locker rooms, meeting spaces, and an athletic training room. There is also a fully-equipped fitness room that looks out over the basketball courts, offering free weights, strength machines, treadmills, elliptical trainers, stationary bikes, ergs and flat-screen televisions above the cardio machines. Connected to the Athletic Center is a hockey rink that doubles as an indoor soccer arena in the spring.

Brooks’ dining services company Meriwether Godsey has a vow it swears by: “Prepare with care.”

And that’s exactly what the vendor, which began servicing our campus at the start of the 2016-2017 school year, and Brooks’ dining hall staff does with each daily breakfast, lunch, dinner and special event served in our Wilder Dining Hall.

Seasonal produce from our campus’ Bobbin Farm is also used in meals, when available. The vegetables are harvested by our resident farmer, with the help of student volunteers, making the offerings true farm-to-table meals.

In addition, Brooks Wilder Dining Hall features the following self serving stations:

Pasta bar

Cereal bar

Salad bar

Gluten-free breads and desserts fridge

Soft-serve ice cream machine

Coffee, latte and hot chocolate maker

Fresh fruit table

*A dining hall staff member prepares the make-your-own sandwich or wraps with the items that students select.

Top 5 Reasons to Attend the Most Dynamic and Educational Residential Soccer Camp in the United States This 2022 Summer!

1. World Class Youth Coaching Staff

We have an international staff of coaches that have dynamic personalities with a passion and focus to develop players to be at their best. Our staff employs the one. teaching method: Communicate clearly, demonstrate clearly/precisely, be patient and allow the player to practice-learn by doing.

2. Professional Training Facilities

The Brooks School is a highly selective, coeducational, independent school for boarding and day students in the 9th through 12th grade located in North Andover, Massachusetts. Brooks School sits on a 270-acre campus overlooking Lake Cochichewicke, located 30 miles from Boston and host an environment that is perfect for an elite residential soccer experience. It is surrounded by a New England signature forest, beautiful fields, and a big lake called “Great Pond”. Brooks host 10 grass fields, state of the art synthetic turf field and top class gymnasium.

3. Healthy, Safe and Educational Friendly Teaching Philosophy

With our Attention to Detail approach, coaches break down each step of a technique so the player understands how it will be performed successfully in a game setting. Our Fail Your Way to Success philosophy and mind set allows and encourages players to identify and learn from their mistakes so that they can ultimately correct specific techniques.

4. one. Curriculum

Innovative, challenging and fun, our curriculum focuses on game related techniques, the decision making process, and how these two topics blend together in a game’s competitive cauldron. Players who attend our camps leave with greater focus and self-confidence in everything they do – beyond the soccer field.

5. Experienced Professional Camp Organization

one. has over 23 years of experience training young athletes. During this time, thousands of players have greatly benefitted on and off the field from our coaching and training. We have students who have moved on to college, national teams and professional careers in both the United States and overseas. Our summer camps have a 90% rate of player retention. In addition, each player receives an English Premier League style jersey, short and socks, along with a Professional Match Ball and Sports Backpack.
